author: pauld.9606
content:
Does anyone know where to find explicit formulas for (2^n)P+Q, where P and Q are in an elliptic curve group, and n is a small positive integer.

The closest I can find is in the appendix of Dimitrov, Imbert, Mishra, "The Double-Base Number System and Its Application to Elliptic Curve Cryptography", but the underlying doublings look inefficient -- it is from 2008.

Hisil's 2010 thesis future ideas section says "this is a big gap in the literature to be filled."

Hopefully it has been filled since 2010.

author: pauld.9606
content: I am considering expanding the expressions on paper and looking for common subexpressions to eliminate, but I suspect that bigger speedups could come from karatsuba/cook/strassen-like tricks, coordinate system tricks, or other tricks.
